ex4D:plugin-description.p: This plugin creates tables, fields and relations based on an XML definition.

ex4D:command-description.p: This command creates tables, fields and relations based on an XML definition.

ex4D:argument.label: xml
ex4D:argument.p: The xml definition text, obtained either via a structure export or a copy from the Structure Editor.

ex4D:return-value.label: error
ex4D:return-value.p: Error code. See Plugin API documentation for details.
